remarks: Used to rederive the Tarski-Bernays-Wajsberg axioms from ~ merco2 . (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 16-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: mercolem4 $p |- ( ( th -> ( et -> ph ) ) -> ( ( ( th -> ch ) -> ph ) -> ( ta -> ( et -> ph ) ) ) ) $.
